info.title: Index Card
info.description:
This is the API for the index card project.

You can access the app at [index-card.vercel](https://index-card.vercel.app)


**Endpoint relation:**

A user can have zero or more realities. The reality only exists if it is related to a user.

A Reality can have zero or more timelines. The timeline only exists if it is related to a reality.

A timeline can have zero or more index cards. The index card only exists if it is related to a timeline.

synopsis.description: The synopsis of the index card.

conflict.description: The conflict of the index card.

timelineId.description: The ID of the timeline this index card belongs to.
